revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Dovado |model=WRG |revision= |est_release_date=02/2007 |fcc_date=09/14/2005 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf=Gemtek |availability=Discontinued |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |fcc_id=MXF-M940830G |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP420 |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=32 |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (32-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Gemtek WMIA-165G |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2413 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=DOVADO |default_ssid_regex=^DOVADO$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1:4431 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless Residential Gateway}} :[http://web.archive.org/web/20080406001308/http://www.dovado.com/WRG.html Product page (via archive.org)] :[http://web.archive.org/web/20070119151952/http://www.dovado.com/pdf/WRG.pdf Datasheet (via archive.org)] :[http://web.archive.org/web/20070114184907/http://www.dovado.com/pdf/WRGguide.pdf Manual (via archive.org)]
*[http://www.dovado.com/en/support/gpl '''Dovado''''s GPL code download page] :The code for the WRG is still available as of 2013-08-03.
===Specifciations=== Per '''Dovado''''s manual... *The default HTTP administration address is 192.168.0.1 @ port 4431. :Username: admin, Password: password *The default SSID appears to be '''DOVADO'''. *Power consumption is ~5W in standby mode and ~15W maximum. *Dimensions are specified as 31 mm x 179 mm x 139 mm. *The device may have an additional designation of WRG-DOV-A002..
Additional specifciations, per '''Dovado''''s datasheet, follow... *Dimensions (H x D x W): [[Dimensions::32 mm x 145 mm x 189 mm]] *Weight: approx. [[Weight::250 g]] *Power supply: 100-240VAC ~ 50-60Hz, 1.0A max. -> 12VDC, 1.25A *Front panel LEDs: Power, WWAN, LAN, Phones *MTBF: > 300,000 hours
===Additional links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/doku.php?id=oldwiki:openwrtdocs:hardware:dovado:wrg On the '''OpenWrt Wiki'''] :The wireless module is specified as a [[Gemtek WMIA-165G]]. :Lacking anything else, the FCC ID of the WMIA-165G :has been assigned to this entry.. *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FuDdGNZ_7vk A '''YouTube''' video (Garage test)]
